entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpv8rh9gw4/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0009.41] The value of Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Accumulated Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Fair Value of Plan Assets, 53,500,000, should be less than or equal to Defined Benefit Plan, Fair Value of Plan Assets, 53,200,000. Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Accumulated Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Fair Value of Plan Assets is a subset of Defined Benefit Plan, Fair Value of Plan Assets.
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlansWithAccumulatedBenefitObligationsInExcessOfPlanAssetsAggregateFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are:
Period: 2016-06-30 Dimensions: us-gaap:RetirementPlanSponsorLocationAxis=us-gaap:DomesticPlanMember Unit: USD Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1024305/000102430517000071/coty-20170630.xml 14110
